title: Iconic Yamaha RX100 reportedly coming back to India in new avatar
description: Yamaha plans to relaunch the iconic RX100 with a bigger engine and the RX nomenclature. The bike, popular since 1980, was discontinued but is now being reintroduced. It may be priced between Rs 1.25 lakh to Rs 1.50 lakh.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
